page.title: 151984-1985 At Ben Jonson
page.content:
This year I enjoyed alot of things in and out of school,we went on lots of outings.During our project on World War 2 we visited the Imperial War Museum,I liked drawing the gas masks best.We also did a project about emergency services and we called it 999.We did lots of work on the police,fire brigade and ambulancemen but I really enjoyed drawing the policemen on horseback.We also entered a Panda Competition which my friends Claire and Shapna won.We also studied King Harold,went up to Hastings to see the Hastings Embroidery and St.Clement's Caves.I liked writing poetry about Harold and William.Some of the boys made very good tapestries.I will miss Ben Jonson when I go on to secondary school.
Christine Wade(11)
